label: 紙背文書
説明文: The Keio-sagara Text is written on the reverse side of recycled waste paper (shihai monjo)-a common practice in an age when paper was a valuable commodity.#[article]Marushima Kazuhiro. Some Preliminary Considerations of the 'Yatsushiro Chronicle' (Yatsushiro nikki) in the Sagara Archives, Keio University Library.
